about_the_game:
Deep Plot

The story is inspired by real events in schools across multiple provinces, including Yunnan, Guangdong, Qinghai, Shandong, Guangxi, and Sichuan. It features true stories from frontline schools in cities such as Baoshan, Tengchong, Lincang, Labuleng, Weifang, Liaocheng, Babi, and Yibin. The 7 chapters span over 3 years, with each mission being engaging and grounded in reality. Over 30 characters are deeply portrayed, each with their own arc, making them vivid and lifelike.

Free Exploration

The game features nearly 30 scenes, where almost every object can be clicked and explored. Each character in the scenes can be interacted with deeply and multiple times. Every exploration is connected to the story, providing an immersive experience that enriches the narrative. The level of exploration directly affects the progression of the story.

Comfortable Immersion

The game supports up to 99 save slots, offering a relaxed pace with no death experience. Players can save and load at any point in the game, allowing them to control their own pace and comfortably experience every detail of the story.

Fun Gameplay

The game is not just about making choices to determine the direction of the text adventure; it also includes several fun mini-games, such as fishing, mushroom picking, crafting, and cooking. Playing these mini-games can significantly impact the plot.

Player Community

We warmly welcome your valuable feedback and invite you to join our community to be the first to receive updates on this game and our other series games.
